code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import studentReducer from"./reducers/studentReducer";var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(combineReducers({student:studentReducer}),composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));store.subscribe(function(){console.log("store data:",store.getState());});export default store;
